import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import UserContext from '../context/UserContext'; import axios from './Axios'; import ErrorCheck from './ErrorCheck'; export default function Menu() { const userCtx = useContext(UserContext); const initialState = { loading: false, data:[], error: null, } const [consultants, setConsultants] = useState(initialState); const [countUser, setCountUser] = useState([0,0,0]); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('consultants?sort=code').then((result)=>{ setConsultants({loading: true, data:result.data.data, error: null, }) }).catch((err)=>{ setConsultants({loading: true, data:[], error:ErrorCheck(err,"Алдаа гарлаа!!!")}) }); },[]); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('users/count',{ headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${userCtx.userState.token}`} }).then((result)=>{ const rCount = result.data.count; setCountUser([rCount.admin+rCount.manager+rCount.consultant,rCount.guide,rCount.users+rCount.blog]); }).catch((err)=>{ setCountUser([0,0,0]); }); },[]) return ( <>

{/* Sidebar Menu */}
